overview: Poppy Pleasure: Women love passion and romance, but sometimes a girl just needs it fast and hard. Alessandra Amore: He had a meeting to go to, but she spread her legs and invited him to a more exciting "meating". Gina Gerson: She was so thankful when he helped her to get her laptop working that she helped him out of his pants. Victoria Velvet: When the TV stopped working, she came up with a much more entertaining way to spend their time.
tagline: A ring on her finger won't keep her legs closed.
title: Wives at Play
